when_to_say: Used to express disagreement or negation.
example: いいえ、違います。 (Iie, chigaimasu.) - No, that's wrong.

when_to_say: Used as a polite greeting when meeting someone for the first time.
example: どうぞよろしくお願いします。 (Dōzo yoroshiku onegaishimasu.) - Nice to meet you.

when_to_say: Used to ask someone to wait briefly.
example: ちょっと待って、すぐ行きます。 (Chotto matte, sugu ikimasu.) - Wait a minute, I'll go right away.

when_to_say: Used to express casual gratitude.
example: どうもありがとう、助かりました。 (Dōmo arigatō, tasukarimashita.) - Thanks a lot, I'm relieved.

when_to_say: Used to refer to the study of society, human social relationships and institutions.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a situation where two or more things are incompatible.
